Question: RLE International GmbH CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
RLE International GmbH

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- RLE International will be showcasing solutions for sustainable mobility, intelligent connectivity, and generative engineering at CES 2024.
- The company will demonstrate its expertise in vehicle engineering tailored for electric vehicles, including vehicle dynamics, lightweight materials, safety technologies, aerodynamics, and thermal management.
- RLE will present leading battery innovations focusing on EV batteries and electric powertrain, utilizing state-of-the-art methods and automated development and manufacturing processes.
- The company will showcase generative engineering methods to increase component performance, reduce CAD resource requirements, and save on CAE resources.
- RLE International is committed to reshaping the global engineering and electric vehicle landscape through innovative engineering and sustainable practices.
- The company will be present at the German Pavilion in the Venetian Expo from January 9th to 12th, 2024, to engage in discussions about the central role of electric vehicles in shaping a greener, more efficient world.
